title: Support items nerfed, bot lane now not a stand still, ornn the god is nolonger unstoppable..
body:
SO fuck it! nunu buff is here time to get an AP main and duo bot until they nerf that shit to. fucking league of legends? riot should change this games name to league of meta slaves (if you want to rank up).

my main hasn't had a buff in fuck knows how long (tryndamere) kled gets camped up the shit house. Camille is fkn trash right now unless you're KS-ing everyone and no one wants to gank the moaki lane because "moaki does no damage why would I gank your lane". 

so just fkn teemo nunu or even ziggs nunu bot and fkn literally snowball to their nexsus! 

this game is becoming stupid. like why the fuck remove the unstoppable force from ornn. stupid. lazy. and their whole fkn balancing team is fkn silver anyway!? I swear to god can I work there man? they seem to take in anyone!

replies.body:
camille is one of the best champions for smurfs and high elo players trying to climb quickly atm though, and is the 2nd most picked toplaner.
comet-domination, ignite, spamming tactical sweep (w) for free comet harass but maxing hookshot (e) for extra kill potential, building triforce into either a hydra or ghostblade, and then just roaming, trapping and killing people.

You can't gank a feeding moakai, but he certainly has enough cc for a gank.

and Ornn was too safe, too powerful, too reliable. The fact that he's unstoppable makes it hard to lock him down when he screws up and difficult to peel against. He was too hard to punish compared to other tanks, whilst also being easier to play than other tanks that had to play larger risk reward games for lane pressure like gnar, urgot and nasus.

Also vayne is still the best adc.

Also teemo is dominant, but he's not OP. He's easy to counterpick, but as a counterpick he's admittedly frustrating. Laning phase becomes either get jungler to camp, which has trade offs and becomes a question of whether you can get fed enough to mitigate the damage botlane will be taking from reduced defensive jungle pressure, or not get a camp, and sit under tower like a little b*tch until you can get an adaptive helm. His power curve is a little bit messed up right now, not overpowered as a whole, but certainly too uneven and polarising at it's high points.

Regarding Orrn, the change they made was really stupid, the unstoppable part of Ornn's W was what made it a special and unique ability and it was not the issue. The damage on his W was the problem, and now Ornn is still doing crazy damage while still getting a free shield and being super tanky. 

I saw a post on the NA boards that explained it better regarding "skill expression" 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/tUjyPA7H-removing-the-unstoppable-on-ornn-is-one-of-the-worst-things-you-can-do-scarra

you'd have to be pretty slow in the head to lose to a Camille in the top lane. all her base damage is gone for early game and if its the W with comet well that's makes you twice as stupid to lose to.

I'm saying me as moaki I can blow the other guys flash within 2mins and my jgler says that to me and wonders why he was hard stuck last season. 

ornn is another thing. NO he was not to safe or to anything. he was the same as urgot hes a counter engage in the laning phase and now hes shit in all phases from removing the only thing that made you feel like you were paying the character you read about.

I don't know why you said vayne is the best adc... kinda lost with that... 

and are you reading what I'm saying or have you read patch notes 8.2? because you're not on topic here. with the nunu buffs, nunu and an AP APC can snowball bot lane faster than a yas can feed his ass off
Never fear patch 8.3 we got some tryndamera buffs!!
